venue.name: Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation

item.description:
Join steampunk fans at the Charles River Museum of Industry & Innovation in Waltham! Learn more at the websites below:

http://www.facebook.c...
http://www.crmi.org/s...

The event runs from 10am-4pm.

Note: Your current host, Radegund, is helping at the festival, so I'm not organizing anything specifically for the Meetup other than that people should come enjoy the festival. If someone else has an idea for something specific (like lunch) and is willing to act as host, please contact me. Otherwise my assumption is that people will get there at the opening time (10am).

EDIT: I will be giving a talk at 10:30am on "Steampunk Prop Making for Beginners". If anyone wants to meet up at that time feel free to come by the table while I am setting up. Otherwise I will be around all day, probably wearing my personal airship. ;)
item.how_to_find_us: Come by the "Steampunk Prop Making for Beginners" talk at 10:30am if you want to meet up. Otherwise if all goes as planned, I will have a blimp strapped to my back. :)
item.name: Steampunk Festival @ Charles River Museum of Industry & Innovation (Waltham)
